snippet.title: 【Dragon Of Saiyu】Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Experience the classic tale of Journey To The West in this Retro 2D platformer  - 【Dragon Of Saiyu】
Play as the young aspiring monk, Sanzang, and defeat strong foes in his quest of attaining the legendary scrolls from the Buddha of far west.

▼Check Out The Demo▼
Itch.io：opalpha.itch.io/dragonofsaiyu

＝＝＝＝＝＝

▼Follow Updates/News for the Game▼
Twitter：twitter.com/StudioOpAGames
Itch.io ：opalpha.itch.io

Created by Studio OpA

＝＝＝＝＝＝

Music Used:
Rainy Day by Souichi Sakagami
